page.title: 11Sport and Recreation
page.content: Bowling greens exist and more young people are taking up the sport. Youth clubs in particular encourage minority sport. Board games are not neglected.Running is very popular and athletes use{Morpeth Harriers.}Some use the coast for water sports. Motoring is popular (motorbikes with youths). Leisurely activities include gardening (leek growing is taken very seriously) pigeon and dog racing, knitting, cooking, pets, fishing and poaching. Younger people attend discos and all sections listen to records, watch television & video. Pubs and social clubs flourish and pub games are greatly in evidence, including quoits. There is also a night club. The library is well used and crafts are practiced at the daqy centre. People eat out at the two restaurants.
